乳腺癌和 MEN1：探索联系研究人员评估了多发性内分泌肿瘤 1 (MEN1) 信使核糖核酸 (mRNA) 在乳腺癌中的作用https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Breast-cancer-and-MEN1-exploring-the-connection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Breast-cancer-and-MEN1-exploring-the-connection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ae09a0d-61a7-45a0-a70e-fb7935926d8a Mon, 17 Jul 2023 05:12:00 -0400 Breast cancer and MEN1: exploring the connection
研究人员展示了使用 sgRNA/dCas9 复合物对多个基因的启动子区域进行靶向表观基因组编辑研究人员使用催化失活的 Cas9 开发并表征了高度特异性的 EpiEditing 系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Researchers-demonstrate-targeted-epigenome-editing-in-the-promoter-region-of-several-genes-using-sgRNAdCas9-complexes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Researchers-demonstrate-targeted-epigenome-editing-in-the-promoter-region-of-several-genes-using-sgRNAdCas9-complexes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97ff79cb-f0c7-4986-b10b-fc189ee4b795 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 05:10:00 -0400 Researchers demonstrate targeted epigenome editing in the promoter region of several genes using sgRNA/dCas9 complexes
了解 HPV 对阴道微生物组的影响及其在宫颈癌中的作用研究人员确定是否可以使用感染 HPV 的女性体内微生物群衍生的代谢物来评估宫颈癌风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Understanding-the-impact-of-HPV-on-the-vaginal-microbiome-and-its-role-in-cervical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Understanding-the-impact-of-HPV-on-the-vaginal-microbiome-and-its-role-in-cervical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06368f21-b5d0-4416-b307-8a0db2640613 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 04:53:00 -0400 Understanding the impact of HPV on the vaginal microbiome and its role in cervical cancer

为制药公司和医疗保健开发创新的混合现实培训平台英国沉浸式技术公司 FourPlus 与合作者 Holosphere 和 Cell and Gene Therapy Catapult 获得了 Innovate UK 的资助，用于创建和测试混合现实培训平台，为制药公司和医疗保健提供定制培训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Innovative-mixed-reality-training-platform-to-be-development-for-pharmaceutical-companies-and-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Innovative-mixed-reality-training-platform-to-be-development-for-pharmaceutical-companies-and-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da96b0fd-7216-41fc-9279-1b0174ba6bfb Mon, 17 Jul 2023 01:31:00 -0400 Innovative mixed reality training platform to be developed for pharmaceutical companies and healthcare
